meanings.sent1: She was outthrowing old clothes to make space in her closet.
meanings.sent2: He outthrows the garbage every morning before work.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought she was outthrowing a toy, but it was actually a sock.
meanings.sent4: With a swift motion, he outthrows his opponent in the game of darts.
meanings.sent5: Outthrowing the ball with precision, she scored a goal in the soccer match.

meanings.definition: The act of throwing something out or away.
meanings.sent1: Outthrowing can help declutter your living space effectively.
meanings.sent2: The outthrowing of old furniture made room for the new couch.
meanings.sent3: The outthrowing of the paper airplane contest was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her outthrowing of excuses surprised everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The outthrowing of the ball into the basket won them the game.
